project_abstract.cdata: In an effort to efficiently develop the unutilized land in the red soil areas of South China, the project intends to introduce cultivation of cash crops and livestock production and improve infrastructure and support services in these areas.  The project, to be carried out over five years supports various components.  They include development of about 27,000 ha of idle land; improvement or extension of existing infrastructure; construction of about 343,000 square metres of buildings; and provision of construction and farm machinery as well as other vehicles.  In addition, project components include development of more than 22,000 ha of cultivated area with crops as well as rehabilitation of tea plantations; provision of purebred stock and feed; rehabilitation or construction of agroprocessing factories; provision of equipment; and a pilot program of research and demonstration.  Economic benefits under the proposed project are expected primarily from increases in agricultural production and productivity which in turn will increase the average per capita income of the largely household farm beneficiaries by 330 percent at full project.

P003488.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>红壤地区开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>为开发华南红壤地区已利用土地，本项目拟在这些地区开始种植经济作物和发展畜牧生产，改善基础设施条件，改进支持服务。本项目为期五年，设有多项内容，包括：（1）开发2.7万公顷左右闲置土地；（2）改造或延伸现有基础设施；（3）新建约34.3万平方米建筑；（4）提供施工机械和农业机械及其它设备或车辆；（5）开发超过2.2万公顷农作物种植区，改造茶园；（6）提供种畜和饲料；（7）试点开展研究和示范。预计项目的经济效益主要来自农业产量增加和生产率提高，而在项目完全展开之时，这两点又会增加受益农户的人均收入。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
